scripts.postinstall: (cd client && npm install) && (cd functions && npm install)
scripts.start:functions: firebase functions:config:set gauntlet.env="development" && firebase serve --only functions
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:functions" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.start:dev: REACT_APP_SERVER_LOCATION=local concurrently "(cd functions && npm run start:dev)" "cd client && npm start"
